item.description:
Last minute meetup!!

Olde School Saloon and Bistro is a new place in New Haven.

I went there last night and the food was excellent and it had a great atmosphere. Tonight is their first night for Karaoke so come and join in the fun.

Olde School Saloon and Bistro is located at State near Court St, across from the train station. From the vintage copper bar right down to the classic antique punch-button cash register, this is a great place. The smell of brisket, corned beef, or their yucca fries with chipotle sauce doesnâ€™t hurt their charm either : )

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Karaoke @ Olde School Saloon and Bistro
